skillTree.localised_description: A Necromancer that can summon a Nightmare is no amateur in the black arts.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.

skillTree.localised_description: Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding Warpstone.

skillTree.localised_description: When the lodestone bell rings, dark magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.

effects.description: Mount: Corpse Cart with Unholy Lodestone

Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

effects.description: Effect range: +35% for "Master of the Dead"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Skeleton Warriors

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Undeath is a magic of rot, of corruption. Funnelled into enemies, it strips them of their lifeforce, but at a cost to the wielder.
Magic exists in the air all around, but the cost of pulling it from the aether is one that few are willing to pay.
Sent before Mannfred to prepare the way for his coming, Obadiah's presence is the omen of the Von Carstein's arrival.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Zombies units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: As Obadiah marches upon the crumbling and decaying Empire, Ghouls flock to his presence.

effects.description:
Battle healing cap: +25% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -25% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +15% for Crypt Ghoul and Crypt Horror units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The magic of the undead comes with many blessings, one being the near-undying vitality it gifts to those who wield its dark power.
The ethereal scythe in Obadiah's hand is more than a mere spectre. Charged from the lifeforce of his allies, it can cut through even the most protective of plate armour.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A necromancer attuned to the ways of the newly dead, Obadiah has long served Mannfred von Carstein in procuring the necessary materials for the creation of the undead.

Immune to attrition from a lack of corruption
	(all units in army)

Armies replenish in foreign territory
	(all units in army)
